016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.health.registry;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.ApplicationConfiguration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.health.api.HealthCheck;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.health.api.HealthCheckRegistry;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.health.api.HealthCheckResult;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
026import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
029
030import java.io.PrintWriter;
031import java.io.StringWriter;
032import java.net.Inet4Address;
033import java.net.Inet6Address;
034import java.net.InetAddress;
035import java.net.NetworkInterface;
036import java.time.Duration;
037import java.time.Instant;
038import java.util.*;
039import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
040import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;
041import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean;
042import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicLong;
043import java.util.function.Supplier;
044import java.util.stream.Stream;
045
046public class DefaultHealthCheckService implements HealthCheckService {
047
048    private static final Logger log = LogManager.getLogger(DefaultHealthCheckService.class);
049
050    private final Map<String, HealthCheck> healthCheckByComponentName = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
051
052    /*
053     * Thread-safe state
054     */
055    private final String timeAtStart = Instant.now().toString();
056    private final ObjectMapper mapper = new ObjectMapper();
057    private final AtomicBoolean shouldRun = new AtomicBoolean(true);
058    private final long minUpdateInterval;
059    private final AtomicLong healthComputeTimeMs = new AtomicLong(-1);
060    private final com.codahale.metrics.health.HealthCheckRegistry healthCheckRegistry;
061    private final List<HealthProbe> healthProbes = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
062
063    /*
064     * State only that is only read and written by the healthUpdateThread, so no need for synchronization
065     */
066    private final Object lock = new Object();
067    private long lastUpdatedEpoch = 0;
068    ObjectNode currentHealth;
069
070    public DefaultHealthCheckService(Configuration configuration, com.codahale.metrics.health.HealthCheckRegistry healthCheckRegistry) {
071        this.minUpdateInterval = Duration.parse("PT"+configuration.getString("health.updater.interval").orElse("1S")).toMillis();
072        this.healthCheckRegistry = healthCheckRegistry;
073        InstanceConfiguration instanceConfiguration = InstanceConfiguration.get(configuration);
074        ApplicationConfiguration applicationConfiguration = ApplicationConfiguration.get(configuration);
075        try {
076            synchronized (lock) {
077                currentHealth = mapper.createObjectNode();
078                currentHealth.put("Status", "false");
079                currentHealth.put("version", applicationConfiguration.getVersion());
080                currentHealth.put("name", applicationConfiguration.getName());
081                currentHealth.put("ip", instanceConfiguration.getIp().getHostAddress());
082                currentHealth.put("ip-all", getMyIPAddressesString());
083                currentHealth.put("running since", timeAtStart);
084                // TODO add service-name / alias / context-path and some other basic info/config about app
085            }
086        } catch (Throwable t) {
087            log.warn("While setting health initialization message", t);
088        }
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public com.codahale.metrics.health.HealthCheckRegistry codahaleRegistry() {
093        return healthCheckRegistry;
094    }
095
096    public DefaultHealthCheckService registerHealthCheck(String key, com.codahale.metrics.health.HealthCheck healthCheck) {
097        healthCheckRegistry.register(key, healthCheck);
098        healthCheckByComponentName.put(key, new WrappedHealthCheck(mapper, healthCheck));
099        return this;
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public DefaultHealthCheckService register(String componentName, HealthCheck healthCheck) {
104        healthCheckByComponentName.put(componentName, healthCheck);
105        healthCheckRegistry.register(componentName, new HealthCheckAdapter(healthCheck));
106        return this;
107    }
108
109    @Override
110    public HealthCheckRegistry registerHealthProbe(String key, Supplier<Object> probe) {
111        return null;
112    }
113
114    @Override
115    public SortedMap<String, HealthCheckResult> runHealthChecks() {
116        SortedMap<String, HealthCheckResult> result = new TreeMap<>();
117        for (Map.Entry<String, HealthCheck> entry : healthCheckByComponentName.entrySet()) {
118            String componentName = entry.getKey();
119            HealthCheck healthCheck = entry.getValue();
120            HealthCheckResult healthCheckResult = healthCheck.check();
121            result.put(componentName, healthCheckResult);
122        }
123        return result;
124    }
125
126    public String getCurrentHealthJson() {
127        synchronized (lock) {
128            updateIfNotSpammed();
129            return currentHealth.toPrettyString();
130        }
131    }
132
133    public ObjectNode getCurrentHealthJackson() {
134        synchronized (lock) {
135            updateIfNotSpammed();
136            return currentHealth.deepCopy();
137        }
138    }
139
140    private void updateIfNotSpammed() {
141        long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
142        long millisSinceLastUpdate = now - lastUpdatedEpoch;
143        if (minUpdateInterval < millisSinceLastUpdate) {
144            performHealthUpdate();
145            lastUpdatedEpoch = now;
146        }
147    }
148
149    public long getHealthComputeTimeMs() {
150        return healthComputeTimeMs.get();
151    }
152
153    public void shutdown() {
154        shouldRun.set(false);
155    }
156
157    private void performHealthUpdate() {
158        try {
159            boolean changed = updateHealth(currentHealth);
160        } catch (Throwable t) {
161            log.error("While updating health", t);
162            {
163                ObjectNode health = mapper.createObjectNode();
164                health.put("Status", "FAIL");
165                health.put("errorMessage", "Exception while updating health");
166                StringWriter strWriter = new StringWriter();
167                t.printStackTrace(new PrintWriter(strWriter));
168                health.put("errorCause", strWriter.toString());
169                currentHealth = health;
170            }
171        }
172    }
173
174    private boolean updateHealth(ObjectNode health) {
175        long start = System.currentTimeMillis();
176        boolean changed = false;
177        boolean status = true; // healthy
178        SortedMap<String, HealthCheckResult> healthCheckResultByKey = runHealthChecks();
179        for (Map.Entry<String, HealthCheckResult> entry : healthCheckResultByKey.entrySet()) {
180            String key = entry.getKey();
181            HealthCheckResult result = entry.getValue();
182            boolean healthy = result.status().healthy();
183            status &= healthy; // all health-checks must be healthy in order for status to be true
184            ObjectNode field = (ObjectNode) health.get(key);
185            if (field == null) {
186                field = health.putObject(key);
187            }
188            changed |= updateField(field, "status", () -> healthy ? "UP" : "DOWN");
189            JsonNode existingDetails = field.get("details");
190            if (existingDetails == null) {
191                if (result.info() != null) {
192                    changed = true;
193                    field.set("details", result.info());
194                }
195            } else {
196                boolean infoChanged = !existingDetails.equals(result.info());
197                changed |= infoChanged;
198                if (infoChanged) {
199                    field.set("details", result.info());
200                }
201            }
202        }
203        boolean effectiveStatus = status;
204        changed |= updateField(health, "Status", () -> effectiveStatus ? "UP" : "DOWN");
205        for (HealthProbe healthProbe : healthProbes) {
206            changed |= updateField(health, healthProbe.key, healthProbe.probe);
207        }
208        long end = System.currentTimeMillis();
209        healthComputeTimeMs.set(end - start);
210        return changed;
211    }
212
213    private boolean updateField(ObjectNode health, String key, Supplier<Object> valueConsumer) {
214        Object value = null;
215        try {
216            value = valueConsumer.get();
217        } catch (Throwable t) {
218            log.warn(String.format("Ignoring health field, error while attempting to compute field: '%s'", key), t);
219        }
220        if (value == null) {
221            return updateField(health, key, (String) null);
222        }
223        if (value instanceof String) {
224            return updateField(health, key, (String) value);
225        }
226        if (value instanceof JsonNode) {
227            return updateField(health, key, (JsonNode) value);
228        }
229        return updateField(health, key, String.valueOf(value));
230    }
231
232    private boolean updateField(ObjectNode health, String key, String value) {
233        JsonNode field = health.get(key);
234        if (value == null) {
235            if (field == null) {
236                return false;
237            }
238            health.remove(key);
239            return true;
240        }
241        if (field != null && !field.isNull() && field.isTextual() && field.textValue().equals(value)) {
242            return false;
243        }
244        health.put(key, value);
245        return true;
246    }
247
248    private boolean updateField(ObjectNode health, String key, JsonNode value) {
249        JsonNode field = health.get(key);
250        if (value == null) {
251            if (field == null) {
252                return false;
253            }
254            health.remove(key);
255            return true;
256        }
257        if (field != null && field.equals(value)) {
258            return false;
259        }
260        health.set(key, value);
261        return true;
262    }
263
264    public static String getMyIPAddressesString() {
265        List<Inet4Address> ip4loopBackIpAddresses = new ArrayList<>();
266        List<Inet6Address> ip6loopBackIpAddresses = new ArrayList<>();
267        List<Inet4Address> ip4siteLocalAddresses = new ArrayList<>();
268        List<Inet6Address> ip6siteLocalAddresses = new ArrayList<>();
269
270        try {
271            Enumeration n = NetworkInterface.getNetworkInterfaces();
272
273            while (n.hasMoreElements()) {
274                NetworkInterface networkInterface = (NetworkInterface) n.nextElement();
275
276                for (Enumeration a = networkInterface.getInetAddresses(); a.hasMoreElements(); ) {
277                    InetAddress addr = (InetAddress) a.nextElement();
278                    boolean loopbackAddress = addr.isLoopbackAddress();
279                    boolean siteLocalAddress = addr.isSiteLocalAddress();
280                    if (addr instanceof Inet4Address ip4addr) {
281                        if (siteLocalAddress) {
282                            ip4siteLocalAddresses.add(ip4addr);
283                        } else if (loopbackAddress) {
284                            ip4loopBackIpAddresses.add(ip4addr);
285                        }
286                    } else if (addr instanceof Inet6Address ip6addr) {
287                        if (siteLocalAddress) {
288                            ip6siteLocalAddresses.add(ip6addr);
289                        } else if (loopbackAddress) {
290                            ip6loopBackIpAddresses.add(ip6addr);
291                        }
292                    }
293                }
294            }
295        } catch (Exception e) {
296            return "Not resolved";
297        }
298
299        return String.join("  ", Stream.of(ip4siteLocalAddresses, ip4loopBackIpAddresses, ip6siteLocalAddresses, ip6loopBackIpAddresses)
300                .flatMap(Collection::stream)
301                .map(InetAddress::getHostAddress)
302                .toList()
303        );
304    }
305
306    public static String getMyIPAddresssString() {
307        String fullString = getMyIPAddressesString();
308        String[] parts = fullString.split("\\s");
309        if (parts.length == 0) {
310            return "";
311        }
312        return parts[0];
313    }
314}
